txt.en: 'These duhirun attacked our hunting-party several days ago. Sadly, I have heard the screams of friends being dragged out of the cavern to a grim fate.'
'These duhirun attacked our hunting-party several days ago. Sadly, I have heard the screams of friends being dragged out of the cavern to a grim fate.'
Instance:  The Trail Ends
'Thank you for dispatching these filthy creatures. I was taken several weeks ago, and I thought that I would never escape. Thank you and may the blessing of the Uch-gwirod be with you.'
' You shall not escape this place. I have barred the entrance.'
Thank you for dispatching these filthy creatures. I was taken several weeks ago, and I thought that I would never escape. Thank you and may the blessing of the Uch-gwirod be with you.'
Recovered a crude key
'Thank you for dispatching these filthy creatures. I was taken several weeks ago, and I thought that I would never escape. Thank you and may the blessing of the Uch-gwirod be with you.'
Unlocked the cell door for a prisoner
'I do not care how you came upon this place, Duvodiad; however, your generosity shall be rewarded. May your ancestors find peace and your heirs be hearty and strong.'
'I am eternally grateful.'
Recovered a crude key from the guards
Seek out guards within the cavern and recover a crude key from them.
'I do not care how you came upon this place, Duvodiad; however, your generosity shall be rewarded. May your ancestors find peace and your heirs be hearty and strong.'
'It will be good to free from this place.'

The Houndmaster Laodegan has heard that an outsider has attacked the dungeon and is guarding the entrance.
Within the depths of this cavern, several of the Uch-l√ªth clansmen and women have been locked away in cages awaiting a grisly fate.
'These duhirun attacked our hunting-party several days ago. Sadly, I have heard the screams of friends being dragged out of the cavern to a grim fate.'
